languages.text: "Не склоняй головы пред нашим чудовищным предтечей. Он родом из тьмы прошлого, он часть того, что пожирало звезды и стирало цивилизации. Он знает только одну выгоду — свою. Дай нам встать против него — это наш час, наш шанс совершить невозможное".

"Do not bow your head before our abominable precursor. It was begotten by the dark abysses of the past. It is a fragment of that which devoured stars and erased civilisations. It knows no benefit other than its own. Allow us to stand against it — this is our time, our impossible chance."
languages.original_text: "Не склоняй головы пред нашим чудовищным предтечей. Он родом из тьмы прошлого, он часть того, что пожирало звезды и стирало цивилизации. Он знает только одну выгоду — свою. Дай нам встать против него — это наш час, наш шанс совершить невозможное".

traits.locale_text: "Do not bow your head before our monstrous forerunner. He is born from the darkness of the past, he is a part of that which has been devouring the stars and wiping out civilisations. He think of benefitting one being only — himself. Allow us to stand against him — this is our moment of glory, our chance to do the impossible."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

It knows no benefit other than its own. Allow us to stand against it — this is our time, our impossible chance."

languages.text: « Ne courbez pas l'échine devant notre abominable précurseur. Il a été engendré par les sombres abîmes du passé, c'est un fragment de ce qui dévore les étoiles et anéantit les civilisations. Il ne cherche que son propre avantage. Laissez-nous l'affronter ; c'est notre chance de réaliser l'impossible. »
languages.original_text: "Do not bow your head before our abominable precursor. It was begotten by the dark abysses of the past. It is a fragment of that which devoured stars and erased civilisations. It knows no benefit other than its own. Allow us to stand against it — this is our time, our impossible chance."

traits.locale_text: « Ne courbez pas l'échine devant notre abominable précurseur. Il a été engendré par les sombres abîmes du passé, c'est un fragment de ce qui dévore les étoiles et anéantit les civilisations. Il ne cherche que son propre avantage. Laissez-nous l'affronter ; c'est notre chance de réaliser l'impossible. »
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: «No te postres ante nuestro monstruoso precursor. Es un engendro de los oscuros abismos del pasado, parte de lo que ha estado devorando estrellas y arrasando civilizaciones. Carece de la capacidad de considerar un beneficio que no sea el suyo. Permítenos alzarnos contra él: este es nuestro momento, nuestra oportunidad de hacer lo imposible».
languages.original_text: "Do not bow your head before our abominable precursor. It was begotten by the dark abysses of the past. It is a fragment of that which devoured stars and erased civilisations. It knows no benefit other than its own. Allow us to stand against it — this is our time, our impossible chance."

traits.locale_text: «No te postres ante nuestro monstruoso precursor. Es un engendro de los oscuros abismos del pasado, parte de lo que ha estado devorando estrellas y arrasando civilizaciones. Carece de la capacidad de considerar un beneficio que no sea el suyo. Permítenos alzarnos contra él: este es nuestro momento de gloria, nuestra oportunidad de hacer lo imposible».
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: “不要向那只恐怖的怪物低头。它诞生于过去，诞生于黑暗的深渊之中。他完整的形态曾吞噬过无数恒星，毁灭了无数文明。它在意的一切只有它自己。让我们站起来，反抗它吧。这是我们的机会，是我们渺茫的希望。”
languages.original_text: "Do not bow your head before our abominable precursor. It was begotten by the dark abysses of the past. It is a fragment of that which devoured stars and erased civilisations. It knows no benefit other than its own. Allow us to stand against it — this is our time, our impossible chance."

traits.locale_text: “不要向那只恐怖的怪物低头。他诞生于过去，诞生于黑暗的深渊之中。他完整的形态曾吞噬过无数恒星，毁灭了无数文明。他唯一在意的一切，就只有他自己。让我们站起来，反抗他吧。这是我们的荣耀之刻，让我们成就无从想象的伟业吧。”
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: "Senkt nicht Euren Kopf vor unseren abscheulichen Vorgänger. Er wurde von den dunklen Abgründen der Vergangenheit geboren. Er ist ein Fragment dessen, was Sterne verschlang und ganze Zivilisationen auslöschte. Er gereicht niemandem zum Vorteil, außer sich selbst. Erlaubt uns, ihm die Stirn zu bieten ... das ist unsere Zeit, unsere unmögliche Chance."
languages.original_text: "Do not bow your head before our abominable precursor. It was begotten by the dark abysses of the past. It is a fragment of that which devoured stars and erased civilisations. It knows no benefit other than its own. Allow us to stand against it — this is our time, our impossible chance."

traits.locale_text: "Verneigt Euren Kopf nicht vor unserem monströsen Vorläufer. Er wurde von den dunklen Abgründen der Vergangenheit geboren, er ist ein Teil dessen, was die Sterne verschlingt und Zivilisationen auslöscht. Er will nur einem einzigen Wesen nutzen: sich selbst. Gestattet uns, uns gegen ihn zu stellen. Das ist unser Augenblick des Ruhms, unsere Chance, das Unmögliche zu tun."
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: 「我らの忌まわしき先駆者を前に頭を下げてはならない。それは過去の暗黒の深淵によって生み出され、星々を食い尽くし、文明を消し去ったものの断片なのだ。それは己自身にのみ利する存在なのだ。我々が立ち向かうことを許し給え。今は我らの時代であり、不可能を撃ち貫く時なのだ」
languages.original_text: "Do not bow your head before our abominable precursor. It was begotten by the dark abysses of the past. It is a fragment of that which devoured stars and erased civilisations. It knows no benefit other than its own. Allow us to stand against it — this is our time, our impossible chance."

traits.locale_text: 「我らの忌まわしき先駆者を前に頭を下げてはならない。それは過去の暗黒の深淵によって生み出され、星々を食い尽くし、文明を消し去ったものの断片なのだ。それは己自身にのみ利する存在なのだ。我々が立ち向かうことを許し給え。今は我らの時代であり、不可能を撃ち貫く時なのだ」
traits.speaker: NomosDemonEngine

languages.text: "Felaketin habercisine boyun eğme. O, geçmişin karanlığından meydana geldi. O, yıldızları yutan ve medeniyetleri yok edenin bir parçası. Kendi iyiliği dışında iyilik bilmez. Ona karşı dimdik duralım. Bu bizim şansımız, imkânsızı başarma şansımız."
languages.original_text: "Do not bow your head before our abominable precursor. It was begotten by the dark abysses of the past. It is a fragment of that which devoured stars and erased civilisations. It knows no benefit other than its own. Allow us to stand against it — this is our time, our impossible chance."
